title: Metal.Gear.Rising.Revengeance.Lossless.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Metal.Gear.Rising.Revengeance.Lossless.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Description: In the role of Raiden - cybernetic ninjas, debuted in Metal Gear 
Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, and again returned to the screens in the Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, you have to endure many trials, and finally find out what happened after events MGS4. In the near future cybernetic technology has become an integral part of the world. Three years after the collapse of the regime of the Patriots for a long time to control the whole world, the situation on the planet heated to a limit. Power is concentrated in the hands of those who belong to the technology, most private military companies PMC, previously controlled by the Patriots turned into criminal syndicates. Raiden - a member of one of the organizations who remained faithful to peace. Superbly prepared, equipped with the latest technology futuristic ninja wants revenge and will stop at nothing to destroy Desperado Enterprises, one of the private military companies.

Year: January 9, 2014 
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person 
Developer: PlatinumGames and Kojima Productions 
Published by: Konami 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: ENG | Multi7 
Voice set Language: ENG 
Tablet: SKIDROW

System requirements: 

Operating System: XP or Vista or 7 or 8 
Processor: Intel Core i5 2400 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video Card: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450
